title: Exogenous application of 5-azacitidin, royal jelly and folic acid regulate plant redox state, expression level of DNA methyltransferases and alleviate adverse effects of salinity stress on Vicia faba L. plants
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Samar A. Omar, Yingming Feng, Min Yu, Samar A. Gamal. Eldin, Medhat E. Eldenary, Sergey Shabala, Suleyman I. Allakhverdiev, Mohamed H. Abdelfattah
